pokedexEntries.red: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedexEntries.blue: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedexEntries.yellow: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.
pokedexEntries.gold: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedexEntries.silver: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedexEntries.crystal: It crawls into foliage where it camouflages itself among leaves that are the same color as its body.
pokedexEntries.ruby: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedexEntries.emerald: Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: It is covered with a green skin. When it grows, it sheds the skin, covers itself with silk, and becomes a cocoon.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedexEntries.diamond: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.pearl: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.platinum: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedexEntries.black: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.white: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.black2: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.white2: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedexEntries.x: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedexEntries.y: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedexEntries.sun: When attacked by bird Pokémon, it resists by releasing a terrifically strong odor from its antennae, but it often becomes their prey.
pokedexEntries.moon: It's easy to catch, and it grows quickly, making it one of the top recommendations for novice Pokémon Trainers.
pokedexEntries.ultraSun: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.
pokedexEntries.ultraMoon: Its body is soft and weak. In nature, its perpetual fate is to be seen by others as food.
